item.title: Hack The Box - Craft
item.description: Welcome to another Forest Hex hacking adventure! üå≤üèπ Today I'm going to exploit some poor programming decisions and leverage those into a root shell. Grab a beer and come along for the ride. Feel free to jump around: Port Scan Exploring the Web Server Exploring Git Exploiting Python for a Reverse Shell Pivoting for More Access Gaining Root Access Port Scan As always, I start with a port scan to see what's open.
